briefdescription.para: Gets the HTTP method.

detaileddescription.para: The HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.).

briefdescription.para: Gets the request URL or path.

detaileddescription.para: The URL or path. Can be relative if base URL is configured.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the request body content.

detaileddescription.para: The body content, or null for no body.

briefdescription.para: Gets the request headers.

detaileddescription.para: Dictionary of header names and values.

briefdescription.para: Gets the query parameters.

detaileddescription.para: Dictionary of query parameter names and values.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the request timeout override.

detaileddescription.para: Custom timeout, or null to use default.

briefdescription.para: Initializes a new instance of the ApiRequest class.
Adds a header to the request.
Adds a query parameter to the request.
Sets a custom timeout for this request.
Sets JSON content for the request body.
Sets string content for the request body.
Sets form URL-encoded content for the request body.
Sets binary content for the request body.
Sets stream content for the request body.
Builds the full URL with query parameters.
Creates a GET request.
Creates a POST request with JSON content.
Creates a POST request.
Creates a PUT request with JSON content.
Creates a PUT request.
Creates a PATCH request with JSON content.
Creates a PATCH request.
Creates a DELETE request.
Creates a HEAD request.
Creates an OPTIONS request.
Represents an HTTP API request.

detaileddescription.para: This class encapsulates all the data needed to make an HTTP request, including URL, method, headers, and body content.
